info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Detroit Free Press]
info.description:
Auto-hides the page header, page footer, and sidebar; mouse over the blue placeholder to restore it. Hides ads, ad-like syndicated content (like Taboola), and other ad-like nuisances.

For old/archived articles. For new articles, there is this: style 67653.
info.additionalInfo:
This style only applies to old/archived articles, which still use the old layout. The site now uses the Gannett (USA Today) layout. For new articles, you want this: style 67653.
